title: Magnificent views await you at Lofts at Farmers Market
posting_body: ['Lofts at Farmers Market', 'Leasing Office:', '260 5th St E', 'St. Paul, MN 55101', 'show contact info', 'Take a look at what Lofts at Farmers Market has to offer!', 'For a spectacular move-in ready Saint Paul, MN apartment to rent, come and visit us at the Lofts at Farmers Market!', 'Like all Weidner Apartment Homes, we pride ourselves on our unparalleled customer service and the pristine care with which we manage our communities.', 'Contact us today to learn about apartment availability, lease agreements, or to schedule a tour.', 'Come and find out what makes the Lofts so special!', 'Rental Information:', '2 Bedroom / 2 Bathroom / 1182 sq ft / $2305/Month', 'Lease Terms:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month', 'Apartment Amenities:', '− Air Conditioning', '− Baseball Field and Farmers Market Views', '− Double Pane Windows', '− Exposed Ductwork', '− Granite Countertops', '− Kitchen Island', '− Microwave', '− Patio/Balcony*', 'In Select Homes', '− Smoke Free Community', '− Washer/Dryer Full Size in Every Home', 'Additional Information:', '− Accepts Credit Card Payments', '− Assigned Parking', '− Cardio Machines', '− Coffee Bar', '− Dry Cleaning Service', '− Grocery Delivery Available', '− On-Line Payments', '− Planned Social Activities', '− Property Manager on Site', '− Storage Space', '− 24 Hour Availability', '− 24-Hour Fitness Center', '− Barbecue/Grill Area', '− Bike Repair Stations', '− Community-Wide WiFi', '− Dry Cleaning Service Available', '− Kingsley Excellence Award', '− Property Manager on Site', '− Reservable Clubhouse', '− Resident Lounge/ Clubroom', 'Leasing Hours:', 'Tue - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM', 'show contact info', 'Pet Policy:', 'Dogs and cats welcome: Max. 2 allowed per home, deposit $200, one-time fee $200, monthly rent $40.', 'No weight limit, breed restrictions apply.', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Management Company:', 'Weidner Apartment Homes, LLC', 'Please note pricing and availability subject to change.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'A4D100A321A94D7']
